alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston; Western Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 22 at 11:04AM EST until December 24 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM FRIDAY TO 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. Localized wind gusts up to 70 mph are possible in the higher elevations of eastern Tucker county. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, higher elevations of Fayette and Westmoreland Counties. In West Virginia, eastern Preston, eastern Tucker, Preston, ridges of eastern Monongalia and northwestern Preston, and western Tucker counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM Friday to 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston; Western Tucker
